data.title: Composers' Association of Serbia
data.text:
34th International Review of Composers, 2025 – CALL for Scores

July 12, 2024

Composers Association of Serbia

34th International Review of Composers

Belgrade, October 2025

CALL for scores

The pieces for the following ensembles are eligible within this call:

1. mixed choir and symphony orchestra (max: 3.3.3.3 – 4.3.3.1 – Timp+3 Perc – Piano – Harp – Strings)

Duration: up to 12 minutes

2. string orchestra (5/4/3/2/1) or string orchestra (5/4/3/2/1) and solo double bass.

Duration: up to 12 minutes

3. ensemble of choice, ranging from 1 to 9 instruments, with or without electronics

Duration: up to 10 minutes

Possible instruments: recorder, flute/piccolo/alto flute, oboe, clarinet/bass clarinet, bassoon, French horn, trumpet, trombone, guitar, harp, piano, harpsichord, accordion, percussion, soprano, mezzo-soprano, baritone, two violins, viola, cello, double bass.

4. solo organ, harp, guitar, accordion, or a combination of these instruments.

Duration: up to 10 minutes Read more →

33rd International Review of Composers, 2024 – CALL for Scores

June 22, 2023

Composers Association of Serbia

33rd International Review of Composers

Belgrade, October 2024

CALL for scores

The pieces for the following ensembles are eligible within this call:

1. string orchestra (5/4/3/2/1) or string orchestra (5/4/3/2/1) and solo accordion.

Duration: up to 12 minutes

2. female choir

Duration: up to 10 minutes

3. ensemble of choice, ranging from 1 to 9 instruments, with or without electronics

Duration: up to 10 minutes

Possible instruments: recorder, flute/piccolo/alto flute, oboe, clarinet/bass clarinet, bassoon, French horn, trumpet, trombone, guitar, harp, piano, harpsichord, accordion, percussion, soprano, mezzo-soprano, baritone, two violins, viola, cello, double bass.

4. solo organ, harp, guitar, accordion, or a combination of these instruments.

Duration: up to 10 minutes Read more →
